mapper.select: select client_id from client where client_id = #{client_id}
select client_id from client where tel = #{tel}
select client_id from client where email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into client (client_id, pass, name, birth, gender, email, status, tel, inputdate) values (#{client_id}, #{pass}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{status}, #{tel}, sysdate)
insert into deleted_user(client_id, d_date) values (#{client_id}, sysdate)
